charges.charge_description: Did knowingly and intentionally possess with intent to distribute approximately 979 kilograms of marijuana. 21:841(a)(1), 841(b)(1)(B). Date of Offense: December 4, 2001. Penalty: Not less than 5 years nor more than 40 years imprisonment without probation, parole or suspended sentence a fine of up to $2 million, at least 4 years SRT, a $100.00 special assessment, and community restitution up to the amount of any fine imposed by the court. (1)

Knowingly, Intentionally, and Unlawfully possess with intent to distribute a controlled substance in Schedule I of the Controlled Substance Act of 1970, to wit: 1,754 pounds (approximate gross weight) of marijuana, Title 21 USC 841 (a)(1). [2:01-m-409]
